case.state: I'm sure you'll start doing better soon, ~name~.
Time for a closer look at your physique, ~name~.
You're doing just fine, ~name~. Don't rush yourself with anything too big yet.
Oh my... Well, that's only a natural reaction to... excitement.
There, that wasn't too hard.
I didn't realise that training Pokemon would keep you in such great shape!
I guessed you'd be fit, but your abs are chiseled!
O-Oh, wow. Some things are just big naturally, I suppose.
Ah... Well, it'll be good to let it breathe at least, ~name~.
Doesn't it feel easier to move around now?
There's no shame in taking things slow at first, ~name~.
Time to get that blood pumping, ~name~!
Keep steady, ~name~. You're almost done.
Ms. Song, you're supposed to take a fifteen minute break every hour.
Feeling the burn yet, ~name~?
Your glutes and thighs are looking very nice, ~name~. Just a little bit longer.
Deep breaths. Don't take it too fast now...
You'll get cramps if you sprint without warming up...
Come on, ~name~. I'm sure you've got nothing to be ashamed of.
That's fine. You shouldn't be afraid to take things slowly.
See? That wasn't so hard, was it? You're doing fine.
Repetitive stress injuries come from rapid repeated movements without a chance to heal. So just take this nice and slow...
Deltoids, pectorals, and abs, all looking very nice.

text.content: One Week Later...
Oh, ~name~! Pleasure seeing you here! I didn't expect sombody of your athletic abilities to attend one of my beginner classes!
I'm glad you came, though! I wanted to speak to you again. Stick around after the class finishes.
Okay class! Hold this pose for one more minute! Then class is dismissed! Just take a deap breath and focus on your balance!
Perfect form, ~name~! The whole class could learn a thing or two from you!
Maybe even I could learn a few things from you!
Whew! That was a great work-out! I hope you have the energy for a little more, though. Now that we're alone, I wanted to tell you something.
From the moment you walked into the Inventory, you have fascinated and inspired me. Your physique, your movement...
It's all perfect! You are simply perfect! You have the form of a true athlete! A Greek God!
I need to study you more. I need to learn more from you.
It's time for a one-on-one workout!
Just remember to stay hydrated!
One Week Later...

I'm glad you came, though! I wanted to speak to you again. Stick around after the class finishes.
Okay class! Hold this pose for one more minute! Then class is dismissed! Just take a deap breath and focus on your balance!
Perfect form, ~name~! The whole class could learn a thing or two from you!
Maybe even I could learn a few things from you!
Whew! That was a great work-out! I hope you have the energy for a little more, though. Now that we're alone, I wanted to tell you something.
From the moment you walked into the Inventory, you have fascinated and inspired me. Your physique, your movement...
It's all perfect! You are simply perfect! You have the form of a true athlete! A Greek Goddess!
I need to study you more. I need to learn more from you.
It's time for a one-on-one workout!
Just remember to stay hydrated!
